casebody.data:
99-0460 (La. 4/1/99)

Doris STEWART as Tutrix of the Minor Children, Ahisha Hall, Shareesa Cherry and Donald Stewart v. CITY OF BATON ROUGE, Michael W. Simon, Clem Mitchell, Jr., Connie Courtney, Terri Lynn Braud, John Marston, and Christy Boyer. No. 99-C-0460. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Stewart, Doris Et Al; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of East Baton Rouge 19th Judicial District Court Div. “D” Number 364,149; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, Number CA97 2544

Denied.

MARCUS, J. not on panel. JOHNSON, J. would grant the writ.
